report.title: Extraction for Poppies
report.author: Sloth
report.bodytext: I found a nice little way of producing low grade opium like tar from californian poppies /n /n note: P used a stainless steel pan but i'm sure you could use pyrex or something. /n /n 1) bring 1 cup water to a boil /n 2) put 2.5 tablespoons poppy seeds in a mortar and pestal and grind it up a bunch (add some of the boiling water if it doesnt grind well) /n 3) add the poppy junk to the pan /n 4) simmer on medium for about 10 - 15 minutes /n 5) strain through a mesh strainer then through a coffee filter /n 6) throw away the seeds and clean the pan /n 7) put the nasty brew back in the pan /n 8) evaporate the water off by simmering it till it starts to get nasty and starts to stick to the sides /n 9) when that happens put it at an angle so the juice collects in a puddle (if your using a gas stove and a pan with a handle you can just prop it up) /n 10) at this point it should be waaaay less that what you started with and you should start to see a orange tar form (could be a different color too) and should smell like burnt sugar sorta /n 11) scrap that up and keep it, I recommend kneading it a bit with a spoon to push out the remaining water /n /n Put that in your pipe and smoke it. It makes me feel nice and warm and floaty =D
